law.catch_line: "Accounting practices and procedures manual" and "SSAP" defined.
law.text:
As used in this subtitle, unless the context requires otherwise:
"Accounting practices and procedures manual" means the accounting practices and procedures manual, as amended, published by the National Association of Insurance Commissioners; and
"SSAP" means the statements of statutory accounting principles in the accounting practices and procedures manual.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 10, effective July 13, 2004.
